data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 1,228 believers in Kolda, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kolda, Senegal
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Kolda. Through your servants plant 126 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 516 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Kolda, Senegal.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Kolda that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Badyara people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
God, we pray for the believers in Kolda, Senegal that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Spirit, please convict the believers in Kolda, Senegal to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Kolda, Senegal. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

location.name: Kolda
